Title: Authorizes certain healthcare workers to file an application for an extreme risk protection order against a person examined by such healthcare worker in certain circumstances
Summary: Authorizes the filing of an application for an extreme risk protection order by a licensed or registered physician, licensed psychologist, licensed clinical social worker, licensed clinical professional counselor, clinical nurse specialist in psychiatric and mental health nursing, psychiatric nurse practitioner, licensed clinical marriage or family therapist who has examined the person against whom the order is sought.
LawCode: Amd ยง6340, add ยง6348, CPLR
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to authorizing certain healthcare workers to file an application for an extreme risk protection order against a person who was examined by such healthcare worker in certain circumstances
